item.title: It's not about numbers: It is the stark reality of the lives of millions of women around the world
item.description: Sixteen years ago, the UN General Assembly adopted a resolution calling for intensified efforts to eliminate all forms of violence against women and requested the Secretary-General of the UN to establish a database to illustrate the extent, nature, and consequences of violence against women and to explore the effectiveness of policy programmes to eliminate violence. In 2009, the database was officially developed and launched as the United Nations Secretary-General's Database on Violence against Women.
